label: -SCANNER|ROMS|Exclude games with these strings in the game name (comma separated)
default: [BIOS], Action Replay, Game Genie, Game Saver, GameBooster, GameShark

label: -SCANNER|ROMS|Include games with these region tags (comma separated)
-SCANNER|ROMS|Exclude games with these region tags (comma separated)
-SCANNER|ROMS|Include games with these language tags (comma separated)
-SCANNER|ROMS|Exclude games with these language tags (comma separated)
COLLECTIONS|Use platform name as collection (Disable for platform specific libraries)
THEMES|Fullpath of source theme music directory
-OG XBOX|Game folder name on each partition of xbox
-OG XBOX|Include Xbox games in Plex library
-OG XBOX|Application folder name on each partition of xbox
-OG XBOX|Include Xbox applications in Plex library
-OG XBOX|Demo folder name on each partition of xbox
-OG XBOX|Include Xbox demos in Plex library
-OG XBOX|Sync Plex library posters to XBMC4Xbox
-CONFIG|Factory reset this plugin (WARNING: this cannot be undone)
